Card - Class in <Unnamed>
This class will create the cards to be used in the game Will assign the images accordingly, rank and suit

Initialize each card with its image, suit and rank
CardImage - Class in <Unnamed>
This class handles the image of the cards Will set the specific location for each one Specific card image And will be handle the animation of the game (draws, repaints and rotates cards)
CardImage(String, int, int) - Constructor for class CardImage
Constructor of each card image of the game
cardsFetched() - Method in class Player
